title: Problems with macOS High Sierra Low Fps Unplayable!!!!
body: I recently updated my mac to macOS High Sierra and now having major issues. When i get into a game its completely unplayable. I play  and my fps changes constantly ranging from like 20 to 50 constantly. It unplayable is really the only option to downgrade because unlike other computers its a little harder i know to downgrade on mac so i was just wondering if anyone has a solution. I have also have done research of other players who are having the same problem and no one has a solution help! I would like to play again :/

replies.body: Hey there, do you know what graphics drivers your PC is currently using with this OS?  Our tech team has been investigating similar reports, and we found that players with High Sierra and Nvidia can resolve this by manually installing[ 378.10 Nvidia Driver](http://www.nvidia.com/download/driverResults.aspx/126538/en-us).  Let me know if this helps you!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=s4PWfmX8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-16T18:39:01.324+0000)
>
> Hey there, do you know what graphics drivers your PC is currently using with this OS?  Our tech team has been investigating similar reports, and we found that players with High Sierra and Nvidia can resolve this by manually installing[ 378.10 Nvidia Driver](http://www.nvidia.com/download/driverResults.aspx/126538/en-us).  Let me know if this helps you!
